package.name: mogilefs
package.summary: PHP client library to communicate with the MogileFS storage
package.description: PHP MogileFS is a client library to communicate with MogileFS trackers. Those trackers are part of the distributed filesystem MogileFS created by Danga Interactive (http://www.danga.com/) and used in serveral large scale projects like LiveJournal.
package.notes: - 5.3 compatibility for ARG_INFO definition (ZEND_BEGIN_ARG_INFO with implicit static) - http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=15284: Invalid format string - http://pecl.php.net/bugs/bug.php?id=15283: Invalid comparison with string literal (patch by crrodriguez@opensuse.org) - Refactored retrieval of the default domain to use new mogilefs_get_default_domain() - QA fixes for really strict compiler options - Removed unused artefacts from earlier version like module globals and RINIT
